description: PersistentVolumeClaimTemplate is used to produce PersistentVolumeClaim objects as part of an EphemeralVolumeSource.

metadata.description: May contain labels and annotations that will be copied into the PVC when creating it. No other fields are allowed and will be rejected during validation.

spec.description: The specification for the PersistentVolumeClaim. The entire content is copied unchanged into the PVC that gets created from this template. The same fields as in a PersistentVolumeClaim are also valid here.
